TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "powered_rail", "quantity": 24, "index": 13}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 53, "index": 14}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 29, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft an oak_trapdoor, I need to craft oak_planks. To craft oak_planks, I need to place oak_log in the crafting grid. I will move the oak_log from slot 25 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now I have crafted oak_planks, I will move the oak_planks from slot 0 to a free inventory slot (eg., 11). I will need 6 oak_planks to craft the oak_trapdoor, so I will need to craft another oak_planks.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
